posts.postText:
Is someone willing to create a .rar or torrent of their maps folder?
I'm new, so I'm missing a fuckton of the maps you all have already downloaded.
Being kicked because of !RTVs sucks since a good number of the maps don't auto-download.

Can someone upload their maps?

I think he means.... (gonna use my previous experience in puzzle mod)....


I try to join and download the map. BUT SOMEONE KEEPS CHANGING IT SO I CANT DOWNLOAD IT!!!! D:< 

*cough* Gash *cough*

but in this case, people rtv too fast??? even though it takes 10 minutes to rtv??? o.o

For me, the maps do the weirdest sorts of things:
The server boots me, says it's downloading the map, and it takes about the same amount of time one would expect it to take.
When it's done downloading, it tries to download the cache, and says the map is missing.

Even though I JUST downloaded it in GMod not 10 seconds ago, it's missing.
My maps folder doesn't show it, either. It's stranger than all hell.

That being said, someone should put up a torrent or an upload of our maps, regardless of my loading problems.
It means someone can leave the download open when they leave for work/classes, then play uninterrupted when they get back.
This has also been happening to me, forcing me to manually find the map on fpsbanana and download the rar from there .-.
